Like the sun, you bring hope to the living and destruction to creatures of shadow.

Constant Benefits: Allies adjacent to you roll two saving throws and take the best result when making death saving throws or saving throws against an effect that deals ongoing necrotic damage.

Trigger: You use a divine encounter or daily attack power.

Effect: The attack deals extra radiant damage equal to your Constitution or Intelligence modifier.

Quirks: Bold, fiery, pompous

Published in Dragon Magazine 382, page(s) 58.
